description: Occupying the site of a restaurant that was highly successful in the 1980s and 90s, Impronta is home to a young local chef who showcases skills acquired in a leading Michelin-starred restaurant in Sicily. As a result of this experience, his enticing dishes have a light Mediterranean feel, embellished with the occasional personal twist.
